content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm pleased to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I am open to discussing a fair market value that reflects the quality and location of the property. How does 800 Euros per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a good starting point, Mister Schmidt. Could we perhaps negotiate a bit lower, given that the apartment is unfurnished and I am a student on a budget?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I understand that every tenant has their own financial considerations. How about we lower the price to 750 Euros per month? This is still a competitive rate for the city center, and it reflects the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. Would this be more suitable for your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 750 Euros is definitely more in line with what I had in mind. It's a fair offer, considering the location and the amenities nearby. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would it be possible to include some additional benefits, such as a few months of free parking or a reduced deposit?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you're a savvy negotiator. I'll tell you what I can do. I can offer you the apartment for 750 Euros per month with one month of free parking. Additionally, I can waive the administration fee, which is typically 50 Euros. This brings the total savings to 100 Euros for the first month. Does this sound like a good deal to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I must say, you're being very generous with your offers. The free parking and waived administration fee make this a very attractive package. I'm definitely interested. However, I would like to ask if there's any possibility of reducing the deposit amount. As a student, I'm always looking to minimize my upfront costs.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your concern about upfront costs. While I cannot reduce the deposit significantly, I can offer to spread it out over the first three months of your lease. This way, you would only need to pay a portion of the deposit upfront, with the remainder to be paid in two equal installments. Does this solution work for you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, that's a very considerate offer. Having the deposit spread out over three months will help me manage my cash flow much better. I appreciate your flexibility on this matter. With these terms, I believe we have a very fair and mutually beneficial agreement. Thank you for your time and for working with me on this. I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month with the additional benefits you've offered. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
